div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 284 Delos, 1905 (306c) Burial: c. 137 B.C. (T); c. 104 (Hackens) Contents: 249 AR. From excavations Athens: New Style tetradr. Disposition: Athens (except 22 which were exchanged) Svoronos, JIAN 1906, pp. 260-7 † Thompson, Athens (Delos Γ), pp. 479-81; NC 1962, pp. 323-4 Lewis, NC 1962, p. 280 Hackens, BCH 1965, p. 515
